result.title: Report on benchmark parameters and loop geometry

result.title: Initial dissemination, standardisation and exploitation plan
result.description:
This deliverable will provide the details of the dissemination, standardisation and exploitation activities undertaken by the project through different channels during its first year, and detailed plan for the future.
(Related to Tasks 7.1, 7.2 and 7.3)
